core/amp/products/product-images:
<section
  class="
    amp-product-images
    {{#unless product.images}}
      amp-no-product-images
    {{/unless}}
  "
  data-image-gallery
>
  {{#if product.images}}
   {{#if product.images.length}}
     <amp-carousel
       width="250"
       height="250"
       layout="responsive"
       autoplay
       loop
       delay="5000"
       type="slides"
     >
       {{#each product.images}}
         <amp-img
           class="amp-product-image"
           src="{{getImage this 'amp-product-image'}}"
           layout="fill"
           alt="{{this.alt}}"
         >
         </amp-img>
       {{/each}}
     </amp-carousel>
    {{/if}}
  {{else}}
    <amp-img
      class="amp-product-image amp-no-image"
      src="{{cdn theme_settings.default_image}}"
      layout="fill"
      alt="{{lang 'common.no_image'}}"
    >
    </amp-img>
  {{/if}}
</section>
